document.full_text: the governor of afghanistan's central bank said a report criticizing him and his agency for failing to uncover the fraud at a private bank was 'completely biased' and 'invalid.'
document.title: afghan central bank defends itself after critical report
lines_and_colors: the governor of afghanistan's central bank said a report criticizing him and his agency for failing to uncover the fraud at a private bank was 'completely biased' and 'invalid.'
